description: FlowSchema defines the schema of a group of flows. Note that a flow is made up of a set of inbound API requests with similar attributes and is identified by a pair of strings: the name of the FlowSchema and a "flow distinguisher".

apiVersion.description: The version of the schema for the object representation

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource

spec.description: The specification of the desired behavior of a FlowSchema.

status.description: The current status of a FlowSchema.
